New Restaurant Now Hiring Service Professionals (Downtown Denver) Written by on October 15th, 2011 “Ambria”, a chef-driven restaurant with mediterranean inspired cuisine is seeking professional servers, hosts, bussers, mixologists, and food runners. Applicants must have a professional demeanor and strong work ethic. Strong food&wine knowledge required (min. 3 yrs fine dining experience). Respond to the link above with a resume, references, and a current photo. Applicants with relevant experience will be contacted to schedule an interview Mon-Fri next week.
Location: Downtown Denver Principals only. Recruiters, please don’t contact this job poster. Please, no phone calls about this job! Please do not contact job poster about other services, products or commercial interests.
